description: Snap, crackle and pop your way to an afternoon treat with these three-ingredient crackle snacks.
name: Chocolate-crackle Bark Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g Woolworths dark cooking chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Line a large lipped baking tray with baking paper. Place chocolate in a large microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 2 minutes on high, stirring every thirty seconds, or until chocolate is melted.
Stir in rice cereal. Spread onto the prepared tray. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until, then break or slice into pieces to serve.
